item.title: Chuunin Exam answers: Re: Chuunin Exam answers
item.content:encoded:
If you went to the Future, and killed your future self, what crime would be committed? Murder

It is sunset in the forest. You need to cross three rivers to deliver a birthday cake to the HoCage. Which is the fastest mode of transportation? Taxi

How do you spot a ninja in the conversation? Screaming victims.

What is the answer to this question? Ninja

I try not to be a threatening spectre, but the scythe obssessive whose been running Clarste's body for all these years really hasn't been playing along correctly, so I'll show him a just why exactly those borrowed powers struggle so hard against him if he's not constantly "fiddling with the wiring" or to be more honest, damning the caddyshack everytime he plays this ridiculous [place of personal abandonment]. Hands off, you're quick, but you're honestly the real bore.

item.title: the point of alt characters: Re: the point of alt characters
item.content:encoded:
The original point to alt characters was to try out all three of the starter bloodlines, since this was before the loop existed to give you a chance to change it.

Now a days, the only legitimate points to alts is to try out both options of the 'Choosing Sides' choice (Fate/Destiny), which is as of this typing still unchangeable, and to try various 'challenge' plays to see how much content you can complete. The current popular challenge is the no-mission challenge, where you do no missions at all (Quests are allowed, though since the Chunin Exam requires 40 D-Rank missions, you are locked at Genin.).
